name: All or Nothing
overview: A game of strategy, adventure and desperate arcade action, in a full 3-D scenario. Parachute into the enemy camp in your attempt to rescue the secret files, locked at random around the camp. Use any items found or stolen to help you in your perilous mission. Bribe, blast, bluff, bomb, outrun, gas, shoot your way past the deadly guards. Amazing flexibility, with full 3-D inside and out, full color, currah speech, music and joystick control this is a real spectrum classic. Superb.
